text: Sione Tuitupu Lauaki (22 June 1981 - 12 February 2017) was a New Zealand rugby union player. He played for the All Blacks between 2005 and 2008. At a club level, he played for the Chiefs, Bayonne and Clermont. He was born in Ha ªapai, Tonga. He grew up in Auckland. Lauaki was diagnosed with heart and kidney problems while playing for Bayonne. He died on 12 February 2017, at the age of 35. ==References== ==Other websites== * Sione Lauaki at AllBlacks.com Category:1981 births Category:2017 deaths Category:New Zealand rugby union players Category:Sportspeople from Auckland
title: Sione Lauaki
